member.summary: Saves the currently loaded file, overwriting the currently selected file.

member.summary: Presents the user with a save file dialog, then saves the currently loaded copy of the save file to the location they specify.

member.name: T:Bayo1Editor.FieldConversions
member.summary: Functions that can be used to convert hex strings to dec values

member.name: F:Bayo1Editor.FieldConversions.ToSimpleDecimal
member.summary: Simply returns the value provided, no conversion necessary.

member.name: F:Bayo1Editor.FieldConversions.FromSimpleDecimal
member.summary: Simply returns the value provided, no conversion necessary.

member.name: F:Bayo1Editor.FieldConversions.ToCoreDecimal
member.summary: Returns the hex provided as the equivalent decimal value that the user would see in-game.

member.name: F:Bayo1Editor.FieldConversions.FromCoreDecimal
member.summary: Returns the decimal provided as the equivalent representation that would occur in the save file.

member.name: M:Bayo1Editor.HexEditor.ReadAsDecimal(System.Byte[],Bayo1Editor.HexDataInfo)
member.summary: Starts at the offset given, then converts each byte into a hex string.
member.param: The offset to look for and the number of bytes to read.
member.returns: The read bytes, converted into a usable value for the end-user.

member.name: M:Bayo1Editor.HexEditor.ReadHexData(System.Byte[],Bayo1Editor.HexDataInfo)
member.summary: Starts at the offset given, then converts each byte into a hex string.
member.param: The offset to look for and the number of bytes to read.
member.returns: Each byte read as a hexadecimal string.

member.summary: Starts at the offset given, then converts each byte into a hex string.
member.param: The number of bytes to read.
member.returns: Each byte read as a hexadecimal string.
